title: Frequently Asked Questions
noResults: No results found for your search.

questions.howToRegister: How do I register for an account?
questions.forgotPassword: I forgot my password. What should I do?
questions.cancelSubscription: How can I cancel my subscription?
questions.dataProtection: How is my personal data protected?

answers.whatIsThisPlatform: This is a real estate platform to buy, rent, and sell properties in Germany.
answers.howToRegister: Click on 'Register' in the top right and fill in your details.
answers.forgotPassword: Use the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page to reset your password.
answers.cancelSubscription: Go to 'Account Settings' > 'Subscription' to manage your plan.
answers.dataProtection: We comply with GDPR and apply high security standards to protect your data.
answers.contactSupport: Use the contact form or write to support@myhome24app.com

question1: How can I reset my password?
answer1: To reset your password, go to the login page and click on 'Forgot Password'. Follow the instructions sent to your email.
question2: Where can I find my invoices?
answer2: Invoices are available in your account dashboard under 'Billing'.
question3: How do I contact customer support?
answer3: You can contact customer support via the 'Help' section or email us directly at support@example.com.
question4: Can I change my subscription plan?
answer4: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time through the 'Plans & Billing' section.
answer5: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption and follow strict data protection regulations to keep your information secure.
